featured.text: Two days before Valentine’s Day in 2002, Alfred received a 19-year-old heart, marking the first time on record that twin adults each received heart transplants.

definition.zh_def: 情人，特別是指情人節時的愛人或伴侶。
definition.en_def: A person with whom one has a romantic relationship, especially on Valentine's Day.
definition.example: She received a beautiful gift from her valentine on February 14th.
